text: Every recommendation you give, try to follow it yourself.
SOLID — even if you can't fully apply it, aim for the closest option.
Make code more readable (Clean Code, DRY).
Try to follow KISS, but if it's impossible, keep it complex only when necessary.
Don't expect others to do something you wouldn't do yourself.
Before changing anything, try creating something new instead.
Gather suggestions and do something if they are to many.
If you need respect from someone, start by respecting that person.
If you'd like to change something, think twice — sometimes changing your mind about the problem is easier and better.
YARGNI — use it always and you'll find some free time.
Don't take new tools until you've mastered the existing ones.
